response.description:
A 1916 historic landmark, this New Orleans hotel overlooks Lafayette Square and is walking distance to the French Quarter. It features an on-site restaurant and bar and is along the St. Charles Streetcar line.

Lafayette Hotel by LuxUrban offers rooms with cable TV, a work desk and coffee maker. The marble-tiled bathrooms offer robes and complimentary toiletries.

The hotel offers guests on-site dining at Desi Vega's Steakhouse, featuring Louisiana cuisine and traditional steakhouse fare.

Guests can also use the business centre and have access to complimentary WiFi.

The Lafayette Hotel by LuxUrban is located directly on St. Charles Avenue. Lafayette Hotel by LuxUrban is less than 2 km from the New Orleans Superdome and Audubon Aquarium of the Americas. Bourbon Street is 2 km away.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

A damage deposit of USD 180 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 14 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

This motel is 2 miles from Grants Pass Museum of Arts. Free Wi-Fi is included in all guest rooms. O'Brien's Rogue River Rafting is 14 minutes’ drive away.

Cable TV is featured in all air-conditioned rooms at Sunset Inn. Simply furnished, each room is equipped with coffee-making facilities.

A 24-hour reception is offered at Grants Pass Sunset Inn. Fax services are available. Vending machines featuring drinks are located on site.

Grants Pass Golf Club is 5 miles from this motel. Several restaurants including Blondies' Bistro are within a 2 mile radius.
You must show a valid photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all special requests cannot be guaranteed and are subject to availability upon check-in. Additional charges may apply.

response.description:
Featuring free WiFi access, Inkawasi Lima offers accommodations in Lima only 100 metres from Malecón Miraflores, a six-mile stretch of parks situated along the cliffs above the Pacific Ocean and 200 metres from the beach. A complimentary American breakfast with fruit juice, eggs, milk, coffee and breads is offered.

Rooms here are all fitted with a TV with cable channels. Some rooms have a flat-screen TV. Bathrooms have a shower and towels are provided. Some rooms have a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a magnificent city or ocean view from the rooms.

At Inkawasi Lima guests will find a fully-equipped shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a tour desk.

The guest house is conveniently located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Miraflores, where guests will find an array of commerce and gastronomical options and a 15-minute walk from Larcomar Shopping Centre. Jorge Chavez International Airport is 13 km away.

Based on local tax laws, Peruvian citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Peru) must pay an additional fee of 18% .To be exempt from this 18% additional fee (IVA), a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented.

Please note both documents are required for fee exemption. Guests who are not able to present both documents will be required to pay the fee.

Foreign business travellers who require a printed invoice, will also be charged the additional 18% regardless of the length of their stay in Peru. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

response.description:
Please note that unaccompanied guests under 18 years old cannot be accommodated in this property.

Please note that the credit card used for the reservation has to be presented upon check-in. In case the initial credit card is not presented, then the payment should be made with a different credit card or cash.

Stay in the heart of Protaras.
Situated in the centre of Protaras, the 4-star Vangelis Hotel & Suites is only a 2-minute walk to Fig Tree Bay and Sunrise Beach. It has an outdoor pool area, and offers air-conditioned apartments with fully-equipped kitchenettes.

They also boast balconies with views of the Mediterranean Sea or the hotel’s garden.

The hotel offers a variety of leisure facilities that include a large lagoon-style swimming pool, a children’s pool and an indoor pool. Other facilities include a tennis court, table tennis, a fitness centre with a gym and a spa. A supervised kids club is available for the younger guests, with an outdoor playground and an indoor playroom with soft furniture and games. The hotel provides 24-hour front desk service, and free private on-site parking.

You can choose to dine at any of the 3 on-site restaurants, or enjoy the cafeteria's coffees and snacks, and the 3 bars for day and night cocktails.

The property offers a variety of water sports.

In the evening take a stroll down Protaras’ main street which is just outside the door, with its array of restaurants, shops and bars and its vibrant night life. Konnos Bay and the rocky coves and clear waters of Cape Greco are just a short drive away from Vangelis Hotel & Suites.

Offering free WiFi, goodluck resort@phayao is set in Phayao. Free private parking is available and the resort also offers free use of bicycles for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

The nearest airport is Mae Fah Luang - Chiang Rai International, 94 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Stay in the heart of Agadir.
Mixing modern amenities with traditional Moroccan features, the Agyad Maroc offers self-catering apartments and studios and an outdoor swimming pool near the beach and city center in Agadir.

Accommodations at the Residence Agyad features a fully equipped kitchenette, satellite TV, direct telephone and a mini-bar. Stay in touch using the free Wi-Fi.

During your stay, have a drink in the piano bar or sit on the outdoor terrace and admire the panoramic view. Enjoy international cuisine in the gourmet restaurant.

There is also a children’s play area and a fully equipped conference room. Take advantage of the free on-site parking.

Please inform Agyad Maroc Appart-Hotel of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. All of our guest rooms are on the 2nd floor accessible by our main staircase. We do not have an elevator.

response.description:
Located in the Haliburton Highlands, this historic and year-round hotel offers snowmobile trails 5 minutes away. It includes a large car park, ideal for ATVs and snowmobiles. Rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi.

Elegantly decorated, each room at Dominion Hotel offers a flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom.

An on-site restaurant features casual dining and special diet menus. Guests can also enjoy the Dominion Hotel Minden’s pub, which sometimes features live entertainment.

Beaverbrook Golf Course is 1.5 km away, while Gull River, accessible for fishing and boating, is adjacent to the property. Haliburton Forest Wolf Centre, perfect for dog sledding and mountain biking, is 1 hours’ drive.

Located in Středokluky, 5 km from the Vaclav Havel Airport Prague, Pension u Sv Prokopa offers a garden with a seating area. Free Wi-Fi is provided in some rooms and free private parking is possible on site.

Some of the rooms have a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities located in the corridor. Some units feature a kitchenette.

Outdoor swimming pool is 200 metres from the property. The Okor Castle is 5 km away and the centre of Prague can be reached within a 30-minute drive.

This modern Golf & Spa Resort is in 120 acres of parkland, located just off Highway A12, at the gateway to Suffolk’s Heritage Coastline and only 10 miles from Ipswich.

Ufford Park Woodbridge boasts numerous facilities such as a health club with swimming pool, gym, sauna and steam room. A thermal suite spa with trained therapists is also available. For golf enthusiasts there is a championship 18-hole course, two tier floodlit driving range, practice putting greens and a teaching academy.

Guests can relax and enjoy a meal in The Park restaurant, which serves a locally sourced menu. The bar also serves food plus an excellent selection of wines and beers, perfect to enjoy on our outside terrace.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Please note that some of our bedrooms are located above our function room.

Please note that during busy periods due to health and safety restrictions, access to the swimming pool may be limited when it reaches maximum capacity of swimmers.

Bed linen can be rented on site for an additional fee of EUR 12 per bed.
Please note that the property includes free electricity usage of [500 kWh] per week. Additional usage will be charged separately.

Please note that prepayment via bank transfer or cheque is due before arrival. Please contact the property in advance to organise this.

extra_lines.imp_info:
A damage deposit of EUR 300 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

response.description:
Chalet Le Grand Paddock, located in the mountainous Saint-Gervais-les-Bains, offers a terrace, garden and countryside views.

The cosy chalet, sleeping up to 10 guests, has 4 bedrooms, a dining room, equipped kitchen and 2 bathrooms. Facilities include a washing machine, hairdryer and a flat-screen TV.

Grocery shops and restaurants can be found within 3 km of the property. The kitchen contains all the necessary utilities for preparing meals.

The situation of the property is ideal for skiing, hiking and rock climbing. If you reserve in advance you can take the shuttle service to the ski lifts, 2 km away.

You might also be interested to visit the beautiful Thermal Centre, 4 km from the property, which offers a variety of luxury wellness treatments.

Situated 150 metres from the centre of Bol on Brač Island, Villa Mediterranea offers a garden with a swimming pool. Free parking and free Wi-Fi, as well as barbecue facilities, are provided at the property. The famous beach Zlatni Rat is 250 metres away.

All units are air-conditioned and feature a private terrace, a seating area, a sofa and satellite TV. An equipped kitchenette is available, while the private bathroom provides a shower. The terrace is fitted with a table and chairs and offers a view of the garden or the sea.

Laundry and ironing service is available and apartments are cleaned every day. Mediterranea Villa serves breakfast in the garden or on each unit's private terrace. There is a restaurant 40 metres away, while a coffee bar can be reached in a few steps. A fresh fruit market can be found 70 metres away.

A beach volley court is 40 metres away, while tennis courts can be reached in 150 metres. The main promenade starts just 30 metres from Villa Mediterranea.

Buses stop 200 metres away, while the Ferry Port is in Supetar, 33 km from the property. Split International Airport is on the mainland, 76 km away.

Set in Algar, in the heart of the White Village route, this traditional hotel provides the ideal base to explore beautiful rural Andalusia.

From the terrace of Tugasa Villa de Algar you can take in the stunning views of the surrounding hills, olive groves and cork farms. The typical whitewashed, Andalusian building overlooks its own garden and outdoor swimming pool, where you can cool off from the Spanish sunshine.

After a day in the fantastic countryside of Cádiz province you can return to enjoy some of the region’s specialities in the hotel restaurant. Here you can try the cured ham, meats, Gazpacho soups and seafood for which the area is famous.
Please note that the restaurant is closed on Tuesday.

extra_lines.imp_info:
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Mon 16 Oct 2023 until Mon 01 Apr 2024

When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included.

This property may host on-site functions and some rooms may be affected by noise.

Please inform Tugasa Villa de Algar in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

response.description:
XO Hotels Blue Tower offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV, in the West-side of Amsterdam. It features bicycle rental and is only 250 metres away from Bos en Lommerplein bus and tram stop, where trams to the city centre depart.

All of the rooms at XO Hotels Blue Tower are refurbished in March 2017 and include a work desk and a Nespresso machine.

A à la carte breakfast is served in Restaurant Saffron.

Amsterdam Sloterdijk Railway Station is less than 20 minutes’ walk away and the centre of Amsterdam is 25 minutes’ journey away by public transport. Schiphol Airport is a 15-minute car journey from XO Hotels Blue Tower.

Please note that the following group policies apply for bookings of 6 rooms or more:
- Group bookings can be paid via Booking.com
- Group bookings will only be confirmed on non refundable rate and conditions

Please note that this property does not serve alcohol.

Please note that the main booker must be minimum 18 years old.

Please note that children until 2 years of age stay free of charge. Children of 3 years or older must pay for their accommodations.

Please note that cash payments are not accepted at this hotel.

By booking at XO Hotels you agree to the XO Hotels house rules and conditions.

response.description:
Hotel Braunlage is located on a quiet side street, directly next to Braunlage's spa gardens, in the Harz Nature Park. The Wurmberg ski slopes are just 500 metres away.

The tasteful, retro style rooms feature modern amenities and includes a flat-screen TV. Some also boast WiFi and a balcony with a view of the spa gardens.

Start your day with a visit to the Nitzschke’s lovingly prepared breakfast room for a tasty continental breakfast. Dinner is available on request and is served in the restaurant Gaststätte Harzheimat, 100 metres away.

The Nitzschke lies next door to the spa gardens and therefore, just a short walk from the spa and its facilities.  The surrounding Harz nature park offers extensive forests with hiking and cycling trails for you to explore.

Motorbikers and cyclists enjoy free parking spaces in the private garage.

response.description:
Please note that some of the restaurants and bars are seasonal.
When booking Suites, free access to the SKYBEACH area is included in the rates. For other rooms, the SKYBEACH area comes at an extra charge: EUR 50 per person (between 5 April - 28 May 2023) and EUR 60 (between 29 May - 15 October 2023).

When booking a Non-Refundable Rate, please make sure that the name on the credit card used for the booking corresponds to the guest staying at the property.  Please note that the credit card used for the booking must be shown at check-in.

Stay in the heart of St. Julianʼs.
Set in the heart of St Julians, InterContinental Malta is 656 feet from its own free private beach on St. George's Bay. It offers spacious rooms with free WiFi access and balcony.

The elegant and spacious rooms offer satellite and pay-per-view channels, air conditioning, and a tea and coffee maker. All rooms feature free WiFi and a balcony or terrace with city views or garden views.

The InterContinental Hotels - Malta is set around large landscaped gardens. Free sports facilities include indoor and outdoor pools and squash courts. Suite guests have complimentary use of SKYBEACH infinity pool on level 19.

Guests staying in suites, can also avail themselves of Club InterContinental lounge set on the 15th floor, where they can enjoy views of the island.

A variety of restaurants and bars can be found around the hotel serving Mediterranean, Maltese and Italian cuisine.

The hotel is a 2-minute walk from St Julian's Terminus bus station, and 6.2 mi from Malta Airport. Valletta, the island's capital, is only a 15-minute drive away.

This charming 1 bedroom villa is located in Es Calo de Sant Agustí village, only 2 minutes’ walk from the beach.  It offers a patio with garden views and a sun terrace. Bicycle rental services are also available.

Casa Nena Es Calo features a seating area with fireplace, sofa bed and a TV. It has a private bathroom and a kitchen including a microwave, electric hob, oven and coffee maker.

You can find restaurants, bars and a supermarket within walking distance from the house. La Savina Ferry Terminal can be reached in about 15 minutes by car. Here you can take a ferry to Ibiza or Dénia.
To arrange key collection, guests are kindly requested to contact the property upon arrival using the telephone number on the booking confirmation.

response.description:
A 5-minute walk from the center of Udine, B&B Hotel Udine offers air-conditioned rooms with an LCD satellite TV. Wi-Fi is free throughout.

B&B Hotel Udine is 0.9 mi from Udine Train Station and a 10-minute drive from the A23 Motorway. On-site parking is available.

Rooms have contemporary décor and parquet floors. Each includes a private bathroom with hairdryer.

response.description:
If you expect to arrive outside check-in hours, please inform the property in advance. You will be provided with the details to check in automatically.

Please note that full payment of the booked stay is due on arrival. This does not apply to nonrefundable rates.

When booking more than 9 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Hotel Dupa offers cosy accommodation located just a 5-minute drive from Lovina Beach. Free private parking is available on site.

Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. The rooms include a private bathroom.

You will find dry cleaning services at the property. There is also a tour desk where guests can get assistance to arrange snorkeling, diving, hiking trips, as well as motorcycle and car hires at additional charges.

It takes about a 40-minute drive from the property to Git-Git Twin Waterfalls and a 50-minut drive to Banjar Hot Sprin and Brahma Buddhist Temple. Getting to Bali Denpasar International Airport can take up to 3 hours by car.
Please note that check-out time is between 10:00 to 12:00. Guests leaving after 12:00 will have to pay the extra charge.
